page.title: 10Another Day Again
page.content: She woke up gradually with the sound of her mother's voice telling her to get out of bed and get ready for school.Out of bed she stumbled and wriggled her toes about to try and find her slippers.She went off to get dressed in her school uniform.After breakfast of cornflakes,toast and pineapple juice she played her computer for thirty minutes.She then collected her school things and went off but forgot to take her new digital watch.School lasted till half past three and after changing into her jeans and jumper she got out her roller_skates to play around in an unused car park.Dinner was at five o'clock and afterwards she played chases with her pals for a couple of hours.She then went home exhausted for a supper of tea and a meat sandwich
